snippet: A state assemblyman representing part of Erie County, Dennis H. Gabryszak, who has been accused by seven women of sexual harassment, said he never intended to harass anyone.
abstract: Dennis H Gabryszak, New York State Assemblyman representing part of Erie County, says that he will step down amid mounting accusations that he sexually harassed women who worked in his office; insists he never intended to harass anyone but was simply engaging in what he termed mutual banter.
lead_paragraph: A state assemblyman representing part of Erie County, Dennis H. Gabryszak, who has been accused by seven women of sexual harassment, said he never intended to harass anyone.

headline.main: Assemblyman to Resign Over Harassment Claims
headline.print_headline: Assemblyman to Resign Over Harassment Claims
